mapper.sql: receive_id, buyer_user_id, receive_name, receive_phone, receive_adress,address,label,if_default, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into cere_buyer_receive
buyer_user_id,
receive_name,
receive_phone,
receive_adress,
address,
label,
if_default,
create_time,
update_time,
#{buyerUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{receiveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{receivePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{receiveAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ifDefault,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update cere_buyer_receive
buyer_user_id = #{buyerUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
receive_name = #{receiveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_phone = #{receivePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_adress = #{receiveAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
label = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
if_default = #{ifDefault,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where receive_id = #{receiveId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update cere_buyer_receive set buyer_user_id = #{buyerUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, receive_name = #{receiveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_phone = #{receivePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_adress = #{receiveAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, label = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, if_default = #{ifDefault,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where receive_id = #{receiveId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT receive_id, receive_name, receive_phone, receive_adress, address FROM cere_buyer_receive where buyer_user_id=#{buyerUserId} ORDER BY CASE if_default when 1 then 1 when 0 then 2 end,update_time DESC,create_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT receive_id,receive_name,receive_phone,receive_adress,address,label,if_default FROM cere_buyer_receive where buyer_user_id=#{buyerUserId} ORDER BY CASE if_default when 1 then 1 when 0 then 2 end,update_time DESC,create_time DESC

SELECT receive_id FROM cere_buyer_receive where buyer_user_id=#{buyerUserId} and if_default=1
and receive_id != #{receiveId}
mapper.update: UPDATE cere_buyer_receive SET buyer_user_id=#{buyerUserId} where buyer_user_id=#{id}
